"A.P.241/9/25/10:00":
"The Profound Darkness has combined
with the Akashic Records. We'll
have to defeat it and separate them."

"It's a rather straight forward plan.
It's no different than what we're
used to."

"I just can't imagine on how the
situation on Omega must look like
and how to get there."

"First of all, how do you travel to
Omega? There's no ship in the ARKS
Fleet that can travel inside a black hole."

"Stop time and fly in there
of course."

"As expected... Honestly, is it the
job of each Claris Claes to do
something reckless?"

"???
What are you trying to say?"

"To put it simply, the laws of
gravity don't apply while time
is frozen."

"We can ignore the influence of the
gravitational pull created by the
black hole and send you to Omega.
While I understand the theory,
it's rather risky."

"It's not risky. I was able to pull
<%me> out, thus the
reverse can be done."

"Although true that it's rather
taxing and I could probably do it
a whole lot better if Claris Claes
was still here..."

"That is why...
Second Generation Claris Claes,
you think you could help me out?"
"What, why me?"

"I need people who are outstanding at
maniuplating Photons. If it's you,
I know everything will be fine."
"1. You've got this, Matoi"
"2. It's ok."

"Alright... I'll do my best.
<%me>, be careful out there
and do your best as well."

"I'm not worried. Because I know
that <%me> will be ok."

"Alright, be careful.
I'll be waiting for your return."

"Xiera, I'll need you to go to Omega with
<%me>. I will temporarily
manage the ship in the meantime."

"Yes, leave it to me!
Wait... Does that means I'm going
inside Omega as well!?"

"I'm not trying to boast about it,
but I have no combat capabilities!"

"Xiera, I will try concentrate on a
form for you that will allow you
to perform your navigation duties."

"However, the appearance you might
take on is up to Omega itself."

"Ugh... I already feel uneasy.
My first time on site and I already
have a bad feeling about this..."
"1. I'll protect you"
"2. You can opt-out if you're scared"

"Yes, Thank you!
I'll be in your care,
<%me>!"

"Yes, I feel awful. But if it's
with you, <%me>,
I'll do my best!"

"Once time has stopped, you can
approach the black hole with the
Campship."

"The closer you are, the easier it
will be to send you through.
So please prepare yourselves before
entering the Campship."
